item.title: CVE-2023-6175|2024-08-06T16:03:26.551Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: NetScreen file parser crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.10 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.18 allows denial of service via crafted capture file
